entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 7 regression in ZipArchive #68734
  • Segmentation fault with linux--arm64 self contained hello world console app #68731
  • Remove API Compat baseline validation suppression #68730
    7.0.0
  • Clarify desired platform attributes on Process types #68729
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Exception stack trace does not have line numbers for Self-Contained(Single Executable) apps with embedded PDBs #39987
    7.0.0
  • CultureInfoConverter doesn't work correctly with UseSystemResourceKeys=true #68651
    7.0.0
  • Results of the Feb 2022 repo survey for dotnet/runtime #67766
    7.0.0
  • Unable to pin arrays of unmanaged structs #68686
    7.0.0
  • Could not load or assemble system.serviceprocess.servicecontroller on windows services. #68646

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete unmanaged AssemblyName parser #68737
    NO-REVIEW, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Improve impPopCallArgs #68736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify AssemblyName marshalling between VM and CoreLib #68735
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Mitigate stress hangs by marking GC-sensitive tests as out-of-proc #68733
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Regenerate fabricbot config to include several new/revised automation tasks #68728
    area-Meta, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Fix the TypeConverter when enabling UseSystemResourceKeys #68687
    area-System.ComponentModel, 7.0.0
  • Remove `Helpers.GenerateRandom`. #68732
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add support for LLVM 14.x #68719
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fixing API compat issues between ref/src for attributes on properties #68432
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Relax argument checks on pinned GCHandles #68694
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices

Updated

  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix RegexCompiler regression on 32-bit for some set matching #68655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Detect the default locale name during startup on Apple platforms #68706
    area-System.Globalization
  • Add document describing how to disable tests #68727
  • Physical value numbering #68712
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • WIP: Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clean up some ActiveIssues in regex #68657
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Use all processor groups if the process is not affinitized to a single one #68639
    area-System.Threading
  • Clean up some debug-only code in Regex #68721
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers version #68724
    area-Meta
  • Reduce allocation in Process.GetProcessesByName #68705
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Delete some unused wrappers for registry operations #68689
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Adding the 2-parameter xplat shuffle helpers and accelerating them #68559
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Reenable 4244 #68615
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Avoid byte[] allocation for IPAddressUtil.IsMulticast #68591
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Align API surface of immutable collections and their corresponding builder types #66550
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add more array.sort test combination #68489
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Type activator should be order agnostic #67493
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [WIP] wasm app host #68696
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add UseSystemd() and UseWindowsService() IServiceCollection extension methods #68580
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • refactor SslStream internals #68678
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Draft for Min/Max intrinsics xarch (#65625) #65700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Disable win-arm64 runtime tests on PRs for CoreCLR #68627
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0017 is not proposed in top-level code #61066
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio freezes even more when bulk undoing hundreds or more actions #61063

Closed

  • [C# 9] IDE0017 is not shown for short constructor call #60982
    Backlog
  • [EnC] Fail to apply updates to a partial method that contains a lambda #60804
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unused private members #61064
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Use property pattern #61062
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61060
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #61059
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #61058
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Prevent EnC error when changing partial methods with lambdas #61039
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Fix double-click on inline-hints for 'var' #61053
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix nullability of source link service #61037
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add feature to show users what global-usings are in scope at the top of a file. #60893
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61061
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #61072
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61071
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #61070
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #61069
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/required-members #61068
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Remaining fallback options #60888
    Area-IDE
  • Code generator fallback options #60882
    Area-IDE
  • Changed IDE0059 codefix title in pattern matching #60822
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Treat some nint/nuint conversions as standard conversions #61034
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int, 17.3
  • Add three new options for collapsing/outlining on file open #60743
    Area-IDE
  • Implement source generator timing APIs #60267
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cleanup u8 string literal workarounds #41455
  • select component value becomes null on change when having a CascadingParameter parameter #41453

Closed

  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2022-21986 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #40072
    Discussions
  • Default MVC template not working on Docker on Linux: The view 'Index' was not found #27232
    Backlog
  • Gets500_30_ErrorPage test failure #37932
    Test failures
  • Quarantine StartupTests.ExpandEnvironmentVariableInWebConfig #38260
    Test failures
  • Quarantine LogsStartupExceptionExitError #38732
    Test failures

PullRequests

Created

  • Minor TagHelper refactoring #41454
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Added overloads on Results/TypedResults for Content/Text with status code #41452
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Sync shared code from runtime #41317
    blocked, area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • Update SDK and use 'u8' string literals #41449
    7.0-preview5
  • Enable trimming for middleware and friends #41373
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview5
  • Helix Restore Issue Mitigation #41311
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • !fixup! Reference Html.Abstractions projects #41413
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] libman libraries not included in first build #6709
  • Radiobutton doesn't appear correctly when FlowDirection is RightToLeft #6708
  • Vertical CollectionView should not attempt to scroll horizontally #6707
  • Title isn't vertically centered in FlyoutItem #6706
  • Failed to connect to localhost/127.0.0.1:7020 #6705
  • ¤ Target current Blazor web app to windows and android #6704
  • Pages with no title hides shell menu on Android #6703
  • Glide tries to set TCS a second time if you background app and then return to it #6702
    6.0.300
  • Shell.FlyoutBehavior="Locked" shows empy menu on Andriod #6701
  • [iOS] Editor.IsEnabled doesn't do anything #6700
    6.0.300
  • QueryProperty is not set when navigating back to page. #6698
  • VerticalOptions FillAndExpand and Fill does not have any effect on the VeticalStackLayout and StackLayout #6694
  • FontImageSource is not displayed on Android, works in Windows. #6693

Closed

  • Its time to change the old idea #6710
  • Shell on Windows: Icons not shown #6330
    6.0.300
  • Shell on Windows: Navigation not working #6329
    6.0.300
  • Span.GestureRecognizers - TapGestureRecognizer not working on windows and Android in Visual Studio 2022 .NET Maui #6257
    6.0.300
  • Visual State Manager Ignored in CollectionView #6019
    6.0.300
  • Windows Navigation Bar does not display Title and/or ToolbarItems Correctly #5887
    6.0.300
  • Expected Style but found Microsoft.Maui.Controls.DataTrigger. #6367
    6.0.300
  • The managed-implementation of HttpClientHandler doesn't work on Android #6174
    6.0.300-servicing
  • ListView ContextActions cause app to crash on Android #6647
  • [Bug] Unable to set image as ContentPage BackgroundImageSource #2966
    6.0.300

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Opacity for Wrapper Views #6711
  • Register for page selected ViewPager2 #6696

Merged

  • [X] find the TargetT of Setter for VSM in Triggers #6668
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Core] Implement BackgroundImageSource in PageHandler #3396
    area/controls 🎮, control-pages, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Shell/Win] Replace missing `PaneCustomContent` with `PaneHeader` prop for the FlyoutHeader #6685
    area/shell 🐢

Updated

  • Spike adding implictor styles to handle null colors #6255
    do-not-merge
